channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood; Sunny Day Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden: Peppa and family come to help make a garden on the roof of the apartments. Mr Bull assists with a big truck and crane. There is even a little something for Mrs Duck! (S7, ep 31).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Sleepover: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Playgroup: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.
